title: Fast Fetching Collectible Cache
description: 分散したNFTファイルの取得は、一般的な使用には遅すぎます。

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal addresses the common problem in NFT space, however it fails to explain how this wallet will attract new users and gives new use cases for NFT in Cardano and also benefit the community. Explain how being able to view NFT in your wallet fast can benefit the community.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal doesn't give out details on how the money will be used. Explain in detail on how many manpower that are required and how much is the pay. What are the required resources and what are the costs.  What is your plan if there is additional funding needed. What are the challenges and risks relevant to successful implementation? Also, provide information on the team members of the project by giving verifiable credentials so the community will know that your team members are able to execute the project. Give a simple explanation on how are you going to develop the prefetched NFT storage cache.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer doesn't give out clear roadmaps.  Explain in detail on what is the expected progress for each of the 3 months timeline. There is no reference to information on how would the community keep track of work progress. There is also no clear definition of success

f6_assessments.q0: Creating a platform/gallary where users can view all NFTs on the blockchain will attract users to the Cardano ecosystem, thus the proposal delivers value to Cardano. The problem statement can be clarified and simplified - Problem - no place to view all NFTs in easy fast a manner Solution - Our platform will have all NFTs under one roof because of our prefetch cache. This proposal might fit better in the  "DApps and Integrations" section of fund 6.
f6_assessments.q1: The team provided a link to a website. I feel the proposal requires further development to ensure successful implementation. I would like to see links to LinkedIn or similar to provide additional detail/evidence about the team work history, education and past experiences. I would like the team to expand on the responsibilities and deliverables of each member of the team, this allows insight on whether there is a work overload in one area. I advise the team to develop a risk assessment considering the challenges and risks relevant to a successful implementation, the team needs to think: "what needs to be true for this project to succeed". I would like the team to further expand on the plan to go to market – how will they recruit viewers for the gallery/platform.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal has no roadmap and one line budget. I would like to see the team develop Key Performance Indicators (KPI's) for the project based on a monthly timetable (eg. 75 users of prototype gallery by month 4, sign up 4000 users by month 9), and connect the KPIs to milestones on the project roadmap (timeline). I would like to see the team create a solid roadmap -  develop and add milestones to provide deeper detail, set technical development milestones for creating the product. I would like to see the budget developed beyond a single line entry and broken down into monthly spending, and I would like the team to connect the KPI's and roadmap milestones to the spending, what are the specific tasks and deliverables that the labor must provide and when must they deliver the tasks – this breakdown will give a clearer indication about the implementation workload feasibility and match the deliverables to the spending - thus the team can track performance and spending over a timeline. As the project stands at the moment, I feel the project will be challenging to audit.

f6_assessments.q0: I think that the problem stated in this proposal can fit into the challenge as making the use of nfts faster will have a positive effect on the nft users and the cardano network. The proposer has not clearly articulated the value that this project can add to the cardano ecosystem. But, by intuition, I can see good values on this. I don't see this proposal scaling in future funds unless it provides more detailed informations on the project.
f6_assessments.q1: The informations on the team are pretty vague. The proposer claim that they build a wallet, but I dont think that this information is enough as proof of a potential implementation success. There is only a link of the wallet but there are no additional informations about the team needed for this project to work. The budget is not broken down and I'm unable to judge if its appropriate. The proposer didn't provide the time necessary to complete the project. To sum it up, this project didn't provide enough informations, for me to think of a successful implementation.
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal has not provided a roadmap. It doesn't include  KPIs. There is a clear description of the problem, and a vague description of the solution. For the lack of a roadmap and KPIs, I can only give this proposal a 3 rating.

f6_assessments.q0: Speeding up the loading process can potentially be useful for the establishment of NFTs. The concept is however only explained very briefly
f6_assessments.q1: While the plan is lacking, the team seems capable, according to the wallet they produced. A detailed budget is missing as well.
f6_assessments.q2: The information is not really sufficient to count as proper success criteria, making it difficult to audit the proposal, milestones are missing.

solution: ブロックチェーン上のすべてのNFTの高速プリフェッチキャッシュを作成することで、コレクターズアイテムの遅い読み込みを修正します。
experience: 私たちは、Adaly Cardano Walletを構築することで、NFTコレクションの出品や譲渡を可能にする経験を積んできました。
